document.full_text: the abbey of san clemente is so far the only monument from a list of 45 cultural landmarks to be fully restored since the earthquake that struck italy in 2009.
document.title: castiglione a casauria journal: abbey's restoration is first stitch to heal a gash in central italy's landscape
lines_and_colors: the abbey of san clemente is so far the only monument from a list of 45 cultural landmarks to be fully restored since the earthquake that struck italy in 2009.
